^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ChassisID.description: The property used to identify different chassis configurations within a system.
ChassisID.longDescription: The property used to identify different chassis configurations within a system,        ensuring proper configuration and management

FTREnabled.description: This property enables or disables the FaultTolerantRedundancy setting.
FTREnabled.longDescription: This property enables or disables the FaultTolerantRedundancy setting.  It takes effect immediately when set, without requiring a Chassis Manager (CM) reset.

FaultLEDStatus.description: The property shall represent the Chassis Fault LED .
FaultLEDStatus.longDescription: The property shall represent the Chassis Fault LED.

IdentificationLEDStatus.description: The property shall represent the Chassis Identification LED.
IdentificationLEDStatus.longDescription: The property shall represent the Chassis Identification LED.

LEDSupportStatus.description: The LED Support on Chassis Indicates the support status of LEDs on the chassis.
LEDSupportStatus.longDescription: The LED Support on Chassis property indicates whether certain LEDs are supported and controlled by the System Controller (SC)

RackID.description: The property used to identify different racks within a system.
RackID.longDescription: The property help in managing and identifying racks within a system, ensuring proper configuration and management.

ServiceTag.description: The property shall represent the service tag of the chassis.
ServiceTag.longDescription: The property shall represent the service tag of the chassis.

SledConfiguration.description: The property SledConfig used to identify the physical configuration of sleds in a chassis.
SledConfiguration.longDescription: These configurations help in managing and identifying sleds within a chassis, ensuring proper thermal and physical management

SledID.description: The property The SledID value used to identify different sled configurations within a chassis.
SledID.longDescription: The property The SledID value used to identify different sled configurations within a chassis.       These IDs help in managing and identifying sleds within a chassis, ensuring proper configuration and management

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AssetName.description: This property contains up to 32 ASCII alpha-numeric characters.
AssetName.longDescription: This property contains up to 32 ASCII alpha-numeric characters.

BackplaneType.description: The property shall represent universal mode or non shared mode of backplane.
BackplaneType.longDescription: The property shall represent universal mode or non shared mode of backplane.

Connector.description: The property shall represent the enclosure port connection.
Connector.longDescription: The property shall represent the enclosure port connection.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property provides the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property provides the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

RAIDEnclosureConfigMode.description: The property shall represent the configuration mode for the enclosure.
RAIDEnclosureConfigMode.longDescription: The property shall represent the configuration mode for the enclosure.

RAIDMultipath.description: The property shall represent whether the adapter has multiple paths to reach the enclosure.
RAIDMultipath.longDescription: The property shall represent whether the adapter has multiple paths to reach the enclosure.

ServiceTag.description: The property shall represent the service tag of the enclosure.
ServiceTag.longDescription: The property shall represent the service tag of the enclosure.

SlotCount.description: The property shall represent the number of drive slots in the enclosure.
SlotCount.longDescription: The property shall represent the number of drive slots in the enclosure.

TempProbeCount.description: This property represents the number of temperature probes present.
TempProbeCount.longDescription: This property represents the number of temperature probes present.

Version.description: The property shall represent the EMM or Backplane version.
Version.longDescription: The property shall represent the EMM or Backplane version.

WiredOrder.description: For JBOD this property shall represent the enclosure position or connection sequence in a daisy chain of enclosures in the relation to the controller port. For internal backplane, the wiredorder is same as BayID.
WiredOrder.longDescription: For JBOD this property shall represent the enclosure position or connection sequence in a daisy chain of enclosures in the relation to the controller port. For internal backplane, the wiredorder is same as BayID.

DellOemEnclosureChassis.description: Oem data related to the Storage Enclosure Chassis.
DellOemEnclosureChassis.longDescription: Oem data related to the Storage Enclosure Chassis.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ChassisManagerConfig.description: This Property helps in managing and identifying sleds within a chassis, ensuring proper power and physical management.
ChassisManagerConfig.longDescription: This Property helps in managing and identifying sleds within a chassis, ensuring proper power and physical management.

DellChassisEnclosure.description: Oem data related to the DellChassisEnclosure.
DellChassisEnclosure.longDescription: Oem data related to the DellChassisEnclosure.

enumDescriptions.Blinking: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a blinking state where the LED is being turned on and off in repetition
enumDescriptions.Lit: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a solid on state.
enumDescriptions.Off: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a solid off state.

enumDescriptions.FullWidth: This value shall represents a sled that spans the entire width of the chassis (5GU for G5).
enumDescriptions.HalfWidth: This value shall represents a sled that occupies half the width of the chassis (5GU for G5).
enumDescriptions.ThirdWidth: This value shall represents a sled that occupies one-third of the width of the chassis (6GU for G5).

title: #DellOemEnclosureChassis.v1_2_0
